fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Fusaka EIP status updates needed for 7607, 7723, 7594, 7918
Hegotá headliner proposals and presentations due February 4th

epbs_updates.highlight: DevNet0 spec frozen at 1.7.0-alpha.1; DevNet1 targeting alpha.2
Two open PRs remain: 4843 ready, 4826 questionable for DevNet1
DevNet0 spec essentially frozen; fork choice issues deferred to DevNet1

timing_discussion.highlight: Proposal: Glamsterdam summer fork June-August maintaining two forks yearly
Barnabas proposes harsh February 20 deadline for ePBS DevNet0

bal_and_related.highlight: BALs causing 100% block size increase ~70-80KB total
Repricings provide flexibility to adjust data vs compute costs
BALs and SLOTNUM CL changes minimal, under one day work

client_incidents.highlight: Teku hit LevelDB threshold during blob spike January 13
Columns doubled causing availability declaration delays and missed slots
Teku switching to RocksDB default; mitigations being implemented

testing_progress.highlight: BAL DevNet timeline: DevNet2 Jan 28, DevNet3 Feb 11
Partial slot proofs DevNet launched yesterday with Lighthouse/Prism implementations

organizational.highlight: Engine API PR 727 changes BALs to single call
Stable Containers 7688: Nimbus, Lighthouse, Lodestar ready; others in progress

action_items.action: Review and implement Engine API PR 727 for DevNet2
Champions present Hegotá headliner proposals by February 4
Implement BALs and SLOTNUM for all CL clients
Follow up on partial slot proofs champion coordination

decisions.decision: End of February deadline for ePBS DevNet0
DevNet0 spec frozen; no further changes before launch
Cannot ship ePBS without partial slot proofs in all clients

targets.target: End of February - ePBS DevNet0 launch
